1461520.name: Age of Rust
1461520.description:
You are Quinn Holt — a covert Syndicate operative navigating a fractured galaxy teeming with pirates, betrayal, and buried secrets. Blend stealth, gunfire, and puzzle-solving to survive black ops missions that blur the line between duty and conspiracy. Trust no one…

The galaxy is in chaos, your destiny shrouded in mystery

AGE OF RUST is a gripping sci-fi stealth adventure set in the fractured year 4224, where Syndicate agents operate in the shadows of a galaxy ruled by pirates, corrupt megacorps, and unraveling alliances. You are Quinn Holt, a once-retired operative pulled back into covert service under Eclipse—an elite tactical division. What begins as a recovery mission quickly unearths a conspiracy that threatens to destabilize what little order remains in the stars.

STEP INTO THE SHADOWS
As Quinn Holt, your past isn’t behind you—it’s what got you recalled. With war scars, black ops training, and a few regrets, you're the Syndicate’s best chance at staying ahead of the chaos. But when you're this deep in, loyalty is a liability—and secrets are currency.

INFILTRATE A FRACTURED GALAXY
From war-torn outposts to corporate-run mining moons, explore tightly crafted environments filled with hidden pathways, surveillance traps, and locked-down intel caches. Whether you’re slipping through enemy corridors or cracking encrypted data vaults, every move matters.

TACTICAL STEALTH. DEADLY CHOICES.
Use silence as your weapon. Take down enemies with precision, sabotage pirate operations, and slip away without leaving a trace. But every choice carves the path ahead—your actions echo across missions, shaping alliances, consequences, and the truth you uncover.

PUZZLES HIDE THE TRUTH
Not every secret hides behind a locked door. You’ll decipher alien scripts, solve environmental puzzles, and unlock encrypted systems—each one pulling you closer to the heart of a conspiracy no one was meant to find.
1461520.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
